akn:section.akn:heading: Electronic creation, recordation, and transfer of liens.

akn:content.akn:p: Notwithstanding any other provision in this chapter, the Director may receive and transmit liens and lien information electronically, record liens electronically, and create and transfer titles electronically, in accordance with the following provisions:
A duly certified copy of the Directorâ€™s electronic record of a title or lien shall be admissible in any civil, criminal, or administrative proceeding as evidence of ownership.
